title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 105.4 - Notification by the contractor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 105.4 - Notification by the contractor

State Regulations

The contractor shall notify the Comptroller in writing within
five business days of: (a) any
conviction or determination against the contractor or a substantially owned or
affiliated person, firm, partnership or corporation; and
(b) the disposition of any appeal. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 2

105.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
